overview:
Bert Solivan is the President at Tracked.com. Before Tracked.com, Solivan worked briefly at ROO Media, where he served as EVP and General Manager. Prior to ROO, Solivan was involved in the successful launch of two News Corporation properties, FOX News Channel and Fox Interactive Media.

At FOX News, where he worked for 10+ years, he held the role of SVP of FOX News and GM of FOXNews.com. Solivan’s other responsibilities included overseeing FOX News’ 24-hour news research department and its on-air fact writing operations. At Fox Interactive Media, he held the role of Executive Vice President.

Prior to joining FOX News, Solivan was a principal at JI, a research consulting firm specializing in financial, executive compensation, and legal research.
